sourceMeaningMnemonic: <radical>Flowers</radical> growing out of a <radical>rice paddy</radical> into the shape of a <radical>cross</radical> are really <kanji>showy</kanji> <kanji>flower</kanji>s.
meaningInfo: Picture these showy flowers growing straight up and out of the middle of the rice paddy, into the shape of a giant cross.
readingMnemonic: These <kanji>flower</kanji>s are too <kanji>showy</kanji>. You hate them. You hate these showy flowers so much you run them over with your <reading>ca</reading>r (<ja>か</ja>)!
readingInfo: Imagine how the car feels as you ram into the showy flowers. The petals explode and rain everywhere. You turn on your windshield wipers to push them away.
